definition: Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge

sentences.english: Oh, attendant, we still need small sake and thank.
sentences.chinese: 噢，服务员，我们还需要一壶小清酒，谢谢。

sentences.english: He is also among the first Japanese Sake Sommeliers in Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 陈铭基先生同时是香港首批日本清酒品酒师。

sentences.english: We like Shao Xing rice wine because it tastes good.
sentences.chinese: 绍兴酒属米酒类，品之香味诱人，有点象日本的清酒。

sentences.english: Shaoxing wine is a sort of rice wine, it is attractive by fragrant , like the Qing wine in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 绍兴酒属米酒类，品之香味诱人，有点象日本的清酒。

sentences.english: Shaohsing wine is a kind of arack. It is tasty and smells good, some like Japanese sake.
sentences.chinese: 绍兴酒属米酒类，品之香味诱人，有点象日本的清酒。

sentences.english: Most mass produced Sake made today has pure distilled alcohol added to it.
sentences.chinese: 在今天，大部分的清酒都有添加食用酒精。

sentences.english: Marinate the minced chicken with 1 tbsp sake in advance and put into the pot of boiled radish.
sentences.chinese: 以1汤匙清酒预先浸腌鸡肉，置于锅内与萝卜同煮。

sentences.english: Sake sales lead to more tax income.
sentences.chinese: 清酒的销售会带来更多的税收。

sentences.english: Pure wine in golden cup costs ten thousand coins, good!
sentences.chinese: 金樽清酒斗十千，玉盘珍羞直万钱。

sentences.english: Shaoxing wine belongs to rice wine , it tastes wonderful and likes Japan 's wine .
sentences.chinese: 绍兴酒属米酒类，品之香味诱人，有点象日本的清酒。

sentences.english: Shaohsing wine is made of rice, just like the Tsing wine in Japan, fragrant and sweet in mouth.
sentences.chinese: 绍兴酒属米酒类，品之香味诱人，有点象日本的清酒。

sentences.english: Yes, I'll have a bottle of warm sake and some ginseng tea.
sentences.chinese: 要，请给我一壶温的日本清酒跟一杯人参茶。

sentences.english: Limpid wine in golden goblets worth ten thousand coppers a bushel; Dainty food on jade plates cost a myriad coins.
sentences.chinese: 金樽清酒斗十千，玉盘珍馐值万钱。

sentences.english: You ate no bread and drank no wine or other fermented drink.
sentences.chinese: 你们没有吃饼，也没有喝清酒浓酒。

sentences.english: Where does the Japan of sweet mouth sake have the woollen cloth selling in Beijing?
sentences.chinese: 甘口的日本清酒在北京哪里有卖的呢？

definition: name of a famous Tang dynasty wine/same as 白酒[bai2 jiu3]
"yellow wine" (mulled rice wine, usually served warm)
Shaoxing wine a.k.a. "yellow wine", traditional Chinese wine made from glutinous rice and wheat
to have a few drinks/to drink to one's heart's content
